Module it.polimi.ingsw.GC24
Package view.CLI

Class CLIPickGodScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.screens.Screen
      • view.screens.PickGodScreen
        • view.CLI.CLIPickGodScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameObserver, TurnObserver, MessageTarget, Observer, InputProcessor, View
    public class CLIPickGodScreen
extends PickGodScreen
implements InputProcessor
    This class represents the screen that is shown when the game is at the GodPicking phase Here the players can, one by one, pick the gods from a pool previously selected
